name: TeenyKVS
description: Library for storing and retrieving data using a simple KeyValueStore format.  Great for storing data on an attached FRAM or SDCARD.  Also great format for radio packets - I used to make radio packets with unique headers and contents BUT now I only have two packet types - A KVS request packet with keys and no values and a response packet with KVS keys and values.  An example of a project that uses this library to store application defaults on an SDCARD can be found here: https://github.com/BeakeS/TeenyGPSTestbed_C2.git
keywords: KVS, KeyValueStore, fram, sdcard, radio, packet, Arduino-Library
